author: PlayStation
description:
https://www.playstation.com/games/GIGASWORD

Balance the weight of the GIGASWORD, battling between brain and brawn. Out Now. Solve intricate puzzles, discover covert chambers, and slash through foes as Ezra fights to reach the top of the Nestrium and recover the God Crystal within. Can he restore the world's coherency before it's too late? Buy GIGASWORD on PlayStation Now! 

#ps5 #ps5games #ps4 #ps4games
title: Gigasword - Launch Trailer | PS5 & PS4 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://www.playstation.com/en-us/games/destiny-2/

Walk the balanced path between fire and shadow.

New Dungeon: Equilibrium.

Tune into the Dungeon Race on December 13, 2025.
⠀ ⠀ ⠀ ⠀
Dive into the free-to-play world of Destiny 2 to experience responsive first-person shooter combat, explore the mysteries of our solar system, and unleash elemental abilities against powerful enemies. Create your Guardian and collect unique weapons, armor, and gear to customize your look and playstyle. Experience Destiny 2’s cinematic story alone or with friends, join other Guardians for challenging co-op missions, or compete against them in a variety of PvP modes.

#ps5 #ps5games #ps4 #ps4games #pcgames #destiny2
title: Destiny 2 - Equilibrium Dungeon Trailer | PS5, PS4 & PC Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://store.playstation.com/concept/10016907

Embrace the Shadows, Ereban: Shadow Legacy Launches Soon on PlayStation! ☀️🌑
The acclaimed stealth platformer from Baby Robot Games and SelectaPlay is coming to PlayStation 5, available in both physical and digital editions.
In Ereban: Shadow Legacy, you play as Ayana, the last descendant of a forgotten race who can merge with the shadows. Use your mystical shadow powers, agility, and advanced stealth techniques to uncover the truth about your people, and the mysterious energy megacorporation, Helios.
Master the balance between light and darkness as you move unseen through stunning sci-fi environments, combining fast-paced stealth, fluid platforming, and deep narrative exploration.

🎮 Key Features:
Innovative Shadow Merging Mechanics: Become one with the shadows to hide, move, and strike unseen.
Stealth Meets Action: Choose your approach: sneak past enemies or eliminate them with deadly precision.
Sci-Fi Storytelling: Unravel the mystery
title: Ereban: Shadow Legacy - Announcement Trailer | PS5 Games

description:

Heroes of Ancaria! Sacred 2 Remaster is out now!
The legendary action RPG returns with upgraded visuals, smoother combat, and every expansion included.

Whether you first explored Ancaria twenty years ago or are discovering it for the first time: this is the ultimate way to experience Sacred 2’s massive open world, alive with quests, dungeons, and countless opportunities for mayhem!

#ps5 #ps5games #sacred2

author: PlayStation
description:
http://www.playstation.com/games/where-winds-meet/

Where Winds Meet joins forces with Song Shuxin, a true martial arts master and consultant for numerous acclaimed martial art movies, to present a live demonstration of the Rope Dart.

The wanderer depends on skill and charisma to mediate conflicts, maintaining peace and order in the martial realm.

With seven weapon types and dozens of martial arts moves now available in the open beta, connect with fellow warriors—let’s spar and forge friendships! In this world of Jianghu, the wanderer sets the rules.

Where Winds Meet will officially launch on November 14.  
Pre-order now!

#ps5 #ps5games #wherewindsmeet
title: Where Winds Meet - Live Action Trailer | PS5 Games
